title: Additional Instructions for Offerings
summary: Leviticus 6 continues with instructions about the burnt offering, grain offering, and sin offering. It also details how restitution must be made for stolen or falsely gained property, followed by a guilt offering.

faq.question: What happens if someone sins by deception or stealing?
faq.answer: They must return what was taken, add a fifth of its value, and offer a guilt offering to God.

faq.question: Who may eat the grain and sin offerings?
faq.answer: Only the male priests in a holy place, as part of their portion.
